title: Warehouse Clearance Sale
description: Final hours of biggest sale. Up to 80% off.
label: reminder

title: The 27th STePS (SoC Term Project Showcase)
description:
Dear Students,

A gentle reminder to register for a Standard Ticket to explore the innovative projects showcased by your peers and enjoy a buffet dinner with friends and fellow students at this festive yet intellectually engaging technology event.

STePS is a public event, so feel free to share the registration link with your family, friends from other schools, or colleagues from your internship or company.

We‚Äôve already received  ~300 registrations, and Standard Ticket registration closes tomorrow!

Register by 5 November to receive a Standard Ticket with Buffet Dinner ‚Äî free of charge!

PastedGraphic-1.png

STePS27_Invite.jpeg
Thanks & Best Regards
-------------------------------------------------
BHOJAN Anand Dr.:: Associate Professor  :: School of Computing :: National University of Singapore :: Computing 1, 13 Computing Drive, Singapore 117417 :: 65-6516 7351(DID) :: 65-6779 1610 (Fax) :: dcsab@nus.edu.sg(E),  banand@comp.nus.edu.sg (E):: https://metaverse.comp.nus.edu.sg (W), www.comp.nus.edu.sg/~bhojan(W)  

Important: This email is confidential and may be privileged. If you are not the intended recipient, please delete it and notify us immediately; you should not copy or use it for any purpose, nor disclose its contents to any other person. Thank you.

On 29 Oct 2025, at 5:13‚ÄØAM, anand <banand@comp.nus.edu.sg> wrote:

Dear Students,
 
We'd like to invite you to the The 27th STePS (SoC Term Project Showcase) held on 12-Nov-2025 [Physical Event], the largest developer centric event of the school. 

Registration opens today!  https://bit.ly/steps27r 
 
STePS has three goals:
E3 :  Education through self-directed peer-learning by facilitating an environment to freely think, create, criticise and reflect with strong support from educational institutes, industry and government agencies; Employment through modern flipped career fair where students demonstrate their skills live to the talent acquisition departments to assess; and Entrepreneurship through collaboration with Industry and Investors. 
From cool new Healthcare Innovations and Game  projects üéÆ to exciting AI/ML enterprise appsüì±, there‚Äôs lots to see and and learn from peers. üòâRegister now to view (and vote!) for your favourite projects at https://uvents.nus.edu.sg/event/27th-steps.   
 
(NB:- Last date for registration of Standard Tickets with Buffet Dinner: 05 Nov 2025)
You can use your registration ID as voter TOKEN to Vote for the best projects.
 
STePS is a public event. All are welcome. Feel free forward this mail, invitation poster and registration link/QR code to your friends/colleague/business partners.

Event Programme [Wednesday 12-Apr-2025]:
üìç Venue: COM3-Level 1 MPH & Foyer

12:00 PM ‚Äì Setup & Preparations (Exhibitors & Sponsors)

1:00 PM ‚Äì Project Presentations & Demos Begin

1:00 PM ‚Äì Best Project & Best Open Source Project Voting & Networking

Engage with project teams for collaboration, internships, jobs, and entrepreneurship opportunities.

1:00 PM ‚Äì Industry Seminars & Sponsor Networking

Visit sponsor booths for job, internship, and collaboration opportunities.

5:30 PM ‚Äì Buffet Dinner (Locations: COM3-Level 1 Foyer)

5:45 PM ‚Äì Voting Closes

6:00 PM ‚Äì Closing Ceremony @ Multipurpose Hall, COM3

Talks by Industry & Alumni

Prize Presentation (Voters have a chance to win prizes! If your first-choice project wins in any track, you could win an exciting reward!)

8:00 PM ‚Äì End of STePS ‚Äì Take the Post-Event Survey
 
We would like to thank all our Industry sponsors and supporters for their continued support!

<STePS27_Invite.jpeg>

<Voting27thSTePS.png><Registration27thSTePS.png>


Best Regards
-------------------------------------------------
BHOJAN Anand Dr.:: Associate Professor  :: School of Computing :: National University of Singapore :: Computing 1, 13 Computing Drive, Singapore 117417 :: 65-6516 7351(DID) :: 65-6779 1610 (Fax) :: dcsab@nus.edu.sg(E),  banand@comp.nus.edu.sg (E):: https://metaverse.comp.nus.edu.sg (W), www.comp.nus.edu.sg/~bhojan(W)  
 
Important: This email is confidential and may be privileged. If you are not the intended recipient, please delete it and notify us immediately; you should not copy or use it for any purpose, nor disclose its contents to any other person. Thank you.

Prize Presentation (Voters have a chance to win prizes! If your first-choice project wins in any track, you could win an exciting reward!)

8:00 PM ‚Äì End of STePS ‚Äì Take the Post-Event Survey

We would like to thank all our Industry sponsors and supporters for their continued support!

Best Regards

title: The 27th STePS
description:
Dear Students,

A gentle reminder to register for a Standard Ticket to explore the innovative projects showcased by your peers and enjoy a buffet dinner with friends and fellow students at this festive yet intellectually engaging technology event.

STePS is a public event, so feel free to share the registration link with your family, friends from other schools, or colleagues from your internship or company.

We‚Äôve already received  ~300 registrations, and Standard Ticket registration closes tomorrow!

Register by 5 November to receive a Standard Ticket with Buffet Dinner ‚Äî free of charge!

PastedGraphic-1.png

STePS27_Invite.jpeg
Thanks & Best Regards
-------------------------------------------------
BHOJAN Anand Dr.:: Associate Professor  :: School of Computing :: National University of Singapore :: Computing 1, 13 Computing Drive, Singapore 117417 :: 65-6516 7351(DID) :: 65-6779 1610 (Fax) :: dcsab@nus.edu.sg(E),  banand@comp.nus.edu.sg (E):: https://metaverse.comp.nus.edu.sg (W), www.comp.nus.edu.sg/~bhojan(W)  

Important: This email is confidential and may be privileged. If you are not the intended recipient, please delete it and notify us immediately; you should not copy or use it for any purpose, nor disclose its contents to any other person. Thank you.

On 29 Oct 2025, at 5:13‚ÄØAM, anand <banand@comp.nus.edu.sg> wrote:

Dear Students,
 
We'd like to invite you to the The 27th STePS (SoC Term Project Showcase) held on 12-Nov-2025 [Physical Event], the largest developer centric event of the school. 

Registration opens today!  https://bit.ly/steps27r 
 
STePS has three goals:
E3 :  Education through self-directed peer-learning by facilitating an environment to freely think, create, criticise and reflect with strong support from educational institutes, industry and government agencies; Employment through modern flipped career fair where students demonstrate their skills live to the talent acquisition departments to assess; and Entrepreneurship through collaboration with Industry and Investors. 
From cool new Healthcare Innovations and Game  projects üéÆ to exciting AI/ML enterprise appsüì±, there‚Äôs lots to see and and learn from peers. üòâRegister now to view (and vote!) for your favourite projects at https://uvents.nus.edu.sg/event/27th-steps.   
 
(NB:- Last date for registration of Standard Tickets with Buffet Dinner: 05 Nov 2025)
You can use your registration ID as voter TOKEN to Vote for the best projects.
 
STePS is a public event. All are welcome. Feel free forward this mail, invitation poster and registration link/QR code to your friends/colleague/business partners.

Event Programme [Wednesday 12-Apr-2025]:
üìç Venue: COM3-Level 1 MPH & Foyer

12:00 PM ‚Äì Setup & Preparations (Exhibitors & Sponsors)

1:00 PM ‚Äì Project Presentations & Demos Begin

1:00 PM ‚Äì Best Project & Best Open Source Project Voting & Networking

Engage with project teams for collaboration, internships, jobs, and entrepreneurship opportunities.

1:00 PM ‚Äì Industry Seminars & Sponsor Networking

Visit sponsor booths for job, internship, and collaboration opportunities.

5:30 PM ‚Äì Buffet Dinner (Locations: COM3-Level 1 Foyer)

5:45 PM ‚Äì Voting Closes

6:00 PM ‚Äì Closing Ceremony @ Multipurpose Hall, COM3

Talks by Industry & Alumni

Prize Presentation (Voters have a chance to win prizes! If your first-choice project wins in any track, you could win an exciting reward!)

8:00 PM ‚Äì End of STePS ‚Äì Take the Post-Event Survey
 
We would like to thank all our Industry sponsors and supporters for their continued support!

<STePS27_Invite.jpeg>

<Voting27thSTePS.png><Registration27thSTePS.png>


Best Regards
-------------------------------------------------

From cool new Healthcare Innovations and Game  projects üéÆ to exciting AI/ML enterprise appsüì±, there‚Äôs lots to see and and learn from peers. üòâRegister now to view (and vote!) for your favourite projects at https://uvents.nus.edu.sg/event/27th-steps.

(NB:- Last date for registration of Standard Tickets with Buffet Dinner: 05 Nov 2025) You can use your registration ID as voter TOKEN to Vote for the best projects.
label: reminder

title: The 27th STePS
description:
Dear Students, 
 We'd like to invite you to the The 27th STePS (SoC Term Project Showcase) held on 12-Nov-2025 [Physical Event], the largest developer centric event of the school. 
 Registration opens today!  https://bit.ly/steps27r 

 STePS has three goals:
E3 :  Education through self-directed peer-learning by facilitating an environment to freely think, create, criticise and reflect with strong support from educational institutes, industry and government agencies; Employment through modern flipped career fair where students demonstrate their skills live to the talent acquisition departments to assess; and Entrepreneurship through collaboration with Industry and Investors.
From cool new Healthcare Innovations and Game  projects üéÆ to exciting AI/ML enterprise appsüì±, there‚Äôs lots to see and and learn from peers. üòâRegister now to view (and vote!) for your favourite projects at https://uvents.nus.edu.sg/event/27th-steps.   

 (NB:- Last date for registration of Standard Tickets with Buffet Dinner: 05 Nov 2025) 
You can use your registration ID as voter TOKEN to Vote for the best projects.
